website_summaries.verdict: Rookies will love using the  healthy dressing recipes printed on the side of this glass shaker bottle.
pros: Shaker features six low fat dressing recipes
cons: Flip cap doesn't shut very well
No gasket or seal between the lid and bottle neck

customer_reviews.title: The recipes and glass are fine but the lid leaks a lot when shaking the ...
customer_reviews.text: The recipes and glass are fine but the lid leaks a lot when shaking the contents. I purchased a similar item a long time ago that did not leak. The brand was "Gemco".
customer_reviews.author: bluecoral

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: White cap doesn't close properly. Created a huge mess all over my kitchen. The cap is cheap and doesn't "click" shut no matter what I do. Even if i hold it tight the whole time I shake, there are leaks from the cracks. It's basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Salad-Life Changing.  Watch out for cap!
customer_reviews.text: This has changed our lives. Making our own salad dressing is so much better tasting and cheaper than store bought stuff. The best features are the measurements and recipes included on the bottle. The cap doesn't stay shut very well. I've sprayed salad dressing around the kitchen. Not fun to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: J Tyme

customer_reviews.title: Lids are a failure
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought two of these. The good news. Containers are attractive and a good size. Dressings look nice inside. The bad news: The lids are worthless. They will not snap shut, just flop around. If you shake it without holding the lid, the dressing flies all over. If you hold it very tight, then it leaks out the threaded sides anyway, your hands are soaked and oily, and anywhere you set it is messed up. There are some useful "recipes" printed, but only one scale. Oz's. There should be Cups and Tablespoons as well to be truly useful The lids make this suppliers product a very bad idea.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Two, BOTH LEAK (see photo).  Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.text: INTENDED USE: Bought to hold vinaigrette salad dressing. MATERIALS / CONSTRUCTION: Slightly flimsy, lightweight plastic cap. Glass bottle is clear, screened markings seem susceptible to wear. (Hand wash only) FUNCTION: CAP DOESN'T SEAL TO THE GLASS BOTTLE. Tried the range from lightly snug to supertight, THE TWO I PURCHASED LEAKED TAP WATER when the bottle was left upside down. No gasket on the lid. Flip lid seals water, but doesn't latch very securely. You'd have to hold it shut if shaking dressing to prevent a mess. VERDICT: Leaks below the cap. Useless. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: potatomonster

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Lid
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of the bottle for my homemade dressing. Not sure if they all have cheap lids or if mine was just faulty but my lid never really snapped so it was never fully closed. For example if I held the bottle up straight and tilted it slightly, it would definitely spill. I had to grasp it shut to shake the dressing for the same reason that it wouldn’t close. It wasn’t too bad since it just went in my fridge, but it definitely irritated me and I would not re-buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade sauces!
customer_reviews.text: This constrainer is great for making healthier dressings and sauces. It even has recipes on the outside if you don’t feel like researching your own. The only downside to this bottle is that with thicker sauces, you cannot squeeze it like a plastic bottle to get it out. Also I am not sure how long the plastic lid will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pisano

customer_reviews.title: Good Bottle for Dressing
customer_reviews.text: The opening is big enough to put dressing ingredients in directly. The glass is thick and seems to be good quality overall. The reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because of the lid. It does not snap closed very tight. I just warn you to hold the top down when you shake the bottle. Otherwise you will have a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Plastic lid broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used it the lid broke and oil ended up on the walls! It was gently hand washed prior to first use. Also, since the lid won't stay closed it doesn't keep well in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to make dressing but.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the various dressing instructions on the bottle however, the lid broke the first time I used it. I contacted Norpro and, while they were very pleasant, they never did replace the bottle. They sent an oil sprayer in it's place and never could figure out - even with pictures I supplied - the correct replacement. Sadly, by the time I gave up the item was out of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: SteveD

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and the measurements on the bottle. It also has some recipes for dressings that are tasty. The only thing is that the lid pops open very easy when shaking so be careful to avoid a mess. Wish the lid closure was more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Sgirl

customer_reviews.title: Leaky top.
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Measuring lines are helpful. Lid leaks when shaking the bottle to mix or pour dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Green

customer_reviews.title: Hold the lid when you shake it!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE when you shake it. The lid does not stay closed. I made oil and vinegar dressing and went to shake it... it went everywhere. I'm not going to return it - that would be a pain. I'll just hold the lid when I shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Wasserott

customer_reviews.title: My favorite salad dressing bottle ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this salad dressing bottle because it's easy to use and the wide mouth makes it easy to clean. It has measurement increments, in ounces, along one side. It even includes recipes. I like it so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: great bottle- top sucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one of these because I like the recipes printed on the side, but be aware the top sucks so bad you’ll have to replace it with another one from a bbq sauce bottle or something that fits.
customer_reviews.author: beautifulsomehow

customer_reviews.title: Take it to work
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Seals well. The only thing I would do differently is make it a sturdy plastic instead of glass. So afraid of breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Editing my review: I ended up sending this to goodwill. The lid is a dealbreaker. You cant shake it because it wont stay shut. Original: 3 stars: Glass part is great. But the lid wont stay shut.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: The cheap plastic cap runs its usefulness.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottle but the cap is a cheap plastic cap that could have come off a disposable bottle of salad dressing and doesn't stay shut which renders the bottle relatively useless. I wish there was a way to get a better top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usefule recipes, unfortunately cap won't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I like the item in general, finding the recipes on the bottle very useful; however, the top/cap won't stay closed. I snap it shut, put it in the fridge and come back to it wide open. Would be nice to keep it closed so that the dressing stays as fresh as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making my own salad dressings. Don't understand the issue with the cap that some reviewers have; just keep fingers on cap when shaking and there's usually no need to shake very hard. Relax!
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Nice bottle but the lid does not close. Screws down but it is supposed to snap open and close. It does not snap closed, stays open all the time and I just used it once. Junk. next time buy a Pandera's salad dressing when done wash it out and reuse the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerclapfc

customer_reviews.title: This item is great for making healthy dressing recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this salad container and all of the healthy home made recipes on it! It is fun to try the different recipes. Is not easy to clean at all and my first lid broke but I liked it so much I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: ITALY 777

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Bottle came as described. Worked great for husband to transport homemade dressings to work. But lid, although never really leak proof, now doesn’t close it pops open when you click it down. I’m sure I can find some replacement top but now the bottle is less useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle, bad leaky lid.
customer_reviews.text: The flip top on the lid doesn't stay closed. It's necessary to hold it closed when the bottle is shaken, and to tape it closed when it's in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid is defective - like the recipes on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: While I like the various dressing recipes right on the bottle, the lid is defective as it does not stay closed. Minor issue and should be fixable by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Would not stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for making my special ranch without eggs dressing. Like the measurements on the side - mix and shake in one container and get little else dirty. The problem I had was that the lid would not stay closed. Was ok when held for mixing but would pop open in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Lid Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: The options for making multiple dressings is awesome, especially to have several recipes right there on the bottle. Super easy to clean and reuse. The lid screws on tightly and stays onto the bottle, but it can spontaneously snap open and leak dressing if you aren't careful. Definitely have to keep a finger on the lid when shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Genie Holtel

customer_reviews.title: the bottle top won't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I like this bottle for mixing salad dressing but the plastic top is not well made. It will not stay closed, so I have to put seran wrap over it while it is in the refrigerator. Would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lja

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with weight, size, and shape of bottle. Opening too narrow for blue cheese, ranch, and other dressings with same consistency as ketchup. I have to whack the bottom of the bottle to make dressing ooze out. Best used with easy to pour dressings.
customer_reviews.author: AJ's granny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these as gifts and am now buying one for myself...well, maybe 2!
customer_reviews.author: S. Root

customer_reviews.title: Defective cap, poor seal.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic open and close cap is supposed to snap shut, but it doesn't. So contents are easily spilled and can't be sealed air tight due to defective cap that doesn't snap shut.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: This container is the best yet for my salad dressings. I bought another one and love the receipts on the side!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sliger

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes it very easy to whip up a quick dressing before dinner and not have all the preservatives that would be found in store-bought dressings. They are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I do not like sweet dressings so this is a very convienent item.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Worthless - Lid Leaks
customer_reviews.text: From the description: "Fill to lines, shake and enjoy!" When you "shake", salad dressing goes all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Karibuni

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and I take it with me if going out with my favorite dressing in it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Defective and not able to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice for making and storing salad dressing. Second time I used it it was impossible to close the top lid completely. So I can’t use it to shake salad dressing. The product is completely useless. I’d like to return it and get my money back but I used twice before I noticed that lid didn’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Cap Isn't Very Tight
customer_reviews.text: I make homemade dressings to give away as gifts, and this bottle is the best I've found but I wish the cap were a little more tight. In order to shake up the dressing, I find that I have to hold my thumb over the flip cap to keep it from popping open and creating a mess, and when I give away a dressing mix, I have to instruct my friends to be careful when they shake to mix. I'll keep looking for a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Thousand Praises

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bottle for the recipes on the bottle as well as other homemade sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who always makes her own salad dressing. Perfect for her, and she had some new dressing recipes to try that are printed on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard No! The lid is ridiculous, wow.
customer_reviews.author: Dyno

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but bad manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are already starting to come off but the bottle and idea are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, so-so cap.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to make homemade salad dressings. I can tell the cap isn't going to last long, but that seems like a cheap piece to pick up in bulk elsewhere for the inevitable need to replace soon.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Useful, happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Like the recipes on the bottle, had no problem with spilage, just twist cap tight. Like it so far!
customer_reviews.author: miha

customer_reviews.title: Jar is very good - but CAP LEAKS - very cheap cap
customer_reviews.text: CAP LEAKS. The cap is not good quality like the bottle. Flimsy and acts like it will break at any time even though it has had little use
customer_reviews.author: NorthEasternBelle

customer_reviews.title: still trying to figure out how to clean it
customer_reviews.text: I make my own dressings & this is great for storing them
customer_reviews.author: egle d. turuta

customer_reviews.title: Forget it and just use a mason jar
customer_reviews.text: Was not a fan of the long neck. Hard to clean unless you have a small bottle brush and I didnt think of it when I purchased it. Think it made the trash bin quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I chose this over others for the flip top that ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over others for the flip top that seals for shaking. The pour hole is bigger than I would prefer but I'll adjust. I would also prefer the overall opening be larger for inserting a measuring spoon. The recipes are helpful & the container size is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvestercrew

customer_reviews.title: Cap doesn’t stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would hold my salad dressing so I can bring it to work but come to find out the cap doesn’t stay closed. So I ended up with salad dressing all in my lunch bag. No good
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle but I think recipe measurements are way off ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle but I think recipe measurements are way off some. It's like there is something off in the translation
customer_reviews.author: gatecitygirl

customer_reviews.title: Disaster
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not snap tight! I had salad dressing everywhere. Very disappointed, ordered a different one.
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: Salad dressing mixer
customer_reviews.text: Heavy glass that might slip out of your hands when "oily"
customer_reviews.author: normmagiera@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Great for our new diet
customer_reviews.text: Great product it has ingredients right on bottle, only thing I wish is if it had a couple of lids to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: I like to shop

customer_reviews.title: Cap cracked immediately
customer_reviews.text: The cap cracked immediately upon use. The lid is not water (or oil) tight so dressing flies when you shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality cap
customer_reviews.text: Nice glass bottle but I got this about a month ago and the cap is already broken.
customer_reviews.author: mom of a spy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter after I showed her mine that I purchased years ago. She and her housemates think it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: But a different one that’s better quality!
customer_reviews.text: Flap on top does not stay closed. Salad dressing recipe variety...meh
customer_reviews.author: deerarat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Loves the recipes, great size so you don’t have too much of one type of dressing :)
customer_reviews.author: FrankBritt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy and simple, recipe ideas in bottle or use your own. Glass vs plastic so another reason to have one! I placed mine in dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Cheap lid
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but I gave it 3 stars because the lid doesn’t stay closed... kinda defeats the purpose- I’m afraid my family will grab it to shake and it will go everywhere! :(
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy use,easy clean-up
customer_reviews.text: I have used this salad dressing maker for my own vegan and raw salad dressings and I have yet to have a stain or clean up in these versus my plastic tumblers i used to use! Tahini and cashew dressings no problem,Vinaigrette not an issue,This was worth every penny not to have to settle on an awkward situation with not having my own container for an expressed use;-)
customer_reviews.author: J. Paschal

customer_reviews.title: Recipes on bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for your own salad dressings plus it has recipes on the side!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G. Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The dressing writing just washes off and you are left with a clear glass bottle. White cap is junk and doesn’t stay shut. Overall disappointed
customer_reviews.author: TabbyO

customer_reviews.title: Nice, with one shortcoming.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item, but make sure you put your thumb or finger over the top of the cap before you shake it or you're in for some annoyance. I found out the hard way and hope this prevents other people from having a mess.
customer_reviews.author: George Moniker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size, good spout, but kinda leaks a bit. Don't be surprised if the outside gets all oily.
customer_reviews.author: phoenixfire

customer_reviews.title: Lid wont stay closed after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Threw the bottle away after first use b/c the lid wouldn't stay closed. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Ramsay Horn

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick glass bottles. The plastic caps have openings large enough for the small bits such as herbs, garlic etc. in a good homemade dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love the recipes on the bottle. Great size! It fits easily in the refrigerator door shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cava

customer_reviews.title: Leaks when shaking dressing inside
customer_reviews.text: When you shake up a dressing inside, it starts leaking from the top cap. I went to unscrew the top and it back hinge immediately cracked. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for making your own dressings, marking on the bottle are all you need.
customer_reviews.author: AnnC

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used yet
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it looks like it will work. It has recipes on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JANET HILL

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It seals well and the various recipes on the side of the bottle are handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Caps did not snap shut
customer_reviews.text: The caps on the top of bottle did not snap shut. We ended up keeping the bottles and using old ( universal) caps from other store bought dressing bottles .
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Hold the lid
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The only problem is that the lid pops open when you shake the bottle to mix the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn R Edge

customer_reviews.title: Bottle top doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of a glass bottle as opposed to plastic but the top doesn't stay... it's constantly popping up so won't keep the dressing fresh as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.author: MBuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to create any dressing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to create any dressing. The bottle opening is wide enough for chopped onions, mustard, etc... The cap's opening is the perfect size too. You have total control of how much you want to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Marcillaud

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: the top does not stay closed. I went to shake my homemade green goddess dressing and it went flying all over the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The glass is thick, and oil residue does not seem to stick. I have not tried the recipes yet, but I will.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrie

customer_reviews.title: Pours messy
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is nice, but the top doesn’t pour well. It is messy and leaves oil on the top. Don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: T H

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t close
customer_reviews.text: The flip top doesn’t snap closed or stay shut at all. Sprayed everywhere the first time I shook it. Fine other than that but...that’s a deal killer.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: caps do not seal
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. The caps do not seal, so one is not able to shake the bottle without it leaking
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schwegler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to make your own dressing and especially if you use spices or herbs (doesn't clog).
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top leaks when shaking the bottle to emulsify the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Russ

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this entire concept. Perfect to give as a gift with an awesome evoo or balsamic vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Great product but issues with lid
customer_reviews.text: The cap does not always like to stay sealed. It will very easily pop open. Other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lid - save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a week and the screw on top would not close properly - leaked and is no longer usable. Save your money and just reuse an empty salad dressing bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Need to work on the lid
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these but the lids don't stay snapped in place and they leak when you pour out contents.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Norpro 809A Salad Dressing Maker
customer_reviews.text: Some of the recipes would be so thick, they would be almost impossible to dispense from the bottle. Lid fits nicely. Markings have stayed on through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle NorthWest

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far have tryed 2 salad dressing recipt on bottle
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Brown

customer_reviews.title: terrible cap
customer_reviews.text: the lid does not stay shut. It opens and is completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: I think this would be great but......
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I think would work great! But I received it and the lid doesn’t close. So it leaks. Darn it!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems finding a salad dressing container so I'm pleased to find one that is large enough and does the job
customer_reviews.author: VCS

customer_reviews.title: Lid leaks and cap does not seal!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheap. Lid wouldn’t close all the way and it leaked. Went in the trash after purchasing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Green

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, cap is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible cap, why would anyone even sell something so worthless?
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Guy

customer_reviews.title: Tops leaks
customer_reviews.text: The cap leaked almost immediately when mixing dressing. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lishewski

customer_reviews.title: Crappy lid included!
customer_reviews.text: Ehh.. not bad. Definitely not good. The plastic top is very cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Convenient recipes on the botttle
customer_reviews.text: Use the recipe on the bottle and store in the refrigerator!
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have the recipe right on the bottle :)
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: The cap doesn’t close tight.
customer_reviews.text: This cap screws on ok, but the snap portion at the top just rests on it. If it tipped, it would leak.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and brand new out of the box they both leaked from the cap spilling dressing when I shook them. Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Norpro 809 Salad Maker, One Size, Shown
product_meta.description: Measures: 8.25" x 2.75" x 2.75" / 21cm x 7cm x 7cmCapacity: 11oz / 330mlMake healthy salad dressings without added fat and chemicals. Fill to lines, shake and enjoy! Handy glass shaker with airtight lid features 6 tasty low fat recipes including French Vinaigrette, Italian Herb, Creamy Caesar, Sesame Scallion, Honey Mustard and Creamy Citrus Ginger. Features measuring guidelines and instructions right on the bottle! Easy pour, locking cap keeps dressing fresh. Attractive for table use. Ideal for storing. Dishwasher safe. Norpro was founded in 1973 with a vision to design, manufacture, and supply the highest caliber kitchenware. Norpro’s offering of innovative, high quality product for cooking, preparing and serving food are produced with superior materials and craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: Measures: 8.25" x 2.75" x 2.75" / 21cm x 7cm x 7cm; Capacity: 11oz / 330ml
Make healthy salad dressings without added fat and chemicals. Fill to lines, shake and enjoy!
Handy glass shaker with airtight lid features 6 tasty low fat recipes including French Vinaigrette, Italian Herb, Creamy Caesar, Sesame Scallion, Honey Mustard and Creamy Citrus Ginger.
Features measuring guidelines and instructions right on the bottle!
Easy pour, locking cap keeps dressing fresh.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
